about.title: Our French Immigration Programs
about.description: Three pathways to French residency, each tailored to a different profile. Our advisors analyze your case and guide you along the safest, most efficient route to your new life in Paris, Lyon, Bordeaux, or any city in France.

eb1.title: Passeport Talent
eb1.description: For researchers, entrepreneurs, and highly qualified profiles. A 4-year residency permit that allows you to live and work in France with your family.

eb2.title: VLS-TS (Salaré / Visitor)
eb2.description: The standard long-stay visa for professionals with local contracts or individuals with their own resources who wish to reside in France for more than 3 months.

eb5.title: Business Investor
eb5.description: For entrepreneurs looking to create or take over a company in France. Includes strategic advice on the economic requirements of the French administration.

hero.title: Your Experts in International Mobility
hero.description: For over 15 years, we have guided more than 16,000 families, professionals, and investors to successfully settle across Europe and beyond. France is our flagship destination, but our global mission knows no borders.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: New Horizons Immigration Law was founded in 2009 in Miami by a team of attorneys with first-hand experience in European administrative systems. Our founding mission was clear: remove the bureaucratic barriers that prevent global talent from seizing the opportunities the world has to offer.
story.paragraph2: Today we run active programs in France — our flagship destination — and we are expanding our operations to Spain, Portugal, and the United Arab Emirates. Each destination has its own legal architecture, and we know it in depth.
story.paragraph3: With offices in Miami, Madrid, and Paris, and clients in over 40 countries, we are the most reliable bridge between global talent and residency opportunities worldwide. We are not just advisors — we are your on-the-ground allies in every destination country.

why.title: Why Choose Us?
why.expertDesc: While France is our primary destination, we manage programs in Spain, Portugal, and the UAE. Each advisor is trained in the specific administrative law of each country.
why.adminDesc: From dossier preparation to official appointment support, we manage every phase of the process so you can focus on planning your new life.
why.humanDesc: Every client has a unique situation. We assign a dedicated advisor to each case, with direct communication in Spanish, English, and French — no intermediaries, no bots.
why.speedDesc: Consular deadlines in any country are strict and mistakes are costly. Our three-layer review system guarantees that every file is flawless before submission.
why.trustDesc: No fine print. We explain exactly what your plan includes, how long it will take, and what to expect at each stage, with real-time updates on your file.
why.globalDesc: We serve clients from over 40 countries. With offices in Miami, Madrid, and Paris, we understand your cultural and legal background, facilitating all cross-border logistics.

countries.title: Our Main Destination
countries.description: We specialize in immigration to France. Explore our active programs and the destinations we’ll be enabling soon.

spain.description: Spain's Golden Visa program offers residency to non-EU nationals who make a significant investment in the country.

uae.title: Talent Residency · UAE
uae.description: The UAE's Golden Visa is a long-term residence visa that enables foreign talents to live, work, or study in the UAE while enjoying exclusive benefits.

countries.mainDescription: France, at the heart of Western Europe, offers an exceptional quality of life, access to the EU market and a world-class social system.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Answers to the most common questions about our immigration programs, processes, and available destinations.

q1.q: Which countries do you have active programs in?
q1.a: We currently have active programs in France, our flagship destination. We are in the process of launching formal programs for Spain, Portugal, and the United Arab Emirates. You can register your interest and we'll notify you as soon as they become available.

q2.q: What is the Passeport Talent and who is it for?
q2.a: It is a multi-year residence permit (up to 4 years) exclusive to France, designed for high-potential profiles: researchers, artists, entrepreneurs, and investors. It allows you to work without an additional work permit and facilitates immediate family reunification.

q3.q: How long does the visa process take?
q3.a: Times vary by destination and consulate. For France, the process typically takes between 2 and 6 weeks after the consular appointment. New Horizons speeds up this process by conducting a technical audit of your file before submission.

q4.q: Is it mandatory to speak the language of the destination country?
q4.a: It depends on the program. In France, there is no initial language requirement for Investment and Passeport Talent visas; permanent residency after 5 years requires an A2/B1 level in French. Spain and Portugal also have gradual requirements. Our advisors will explain exactly what applies to your case.

q5.q: What should I do upon arriving at my destination with my visa?
q5.a: In France, most VLS-TS visas must be validated with the OFII (French Office for Immigration and Integration) within the first 3 months. Each country has its own arrival steps; we accompany you and manage all these procedures on your behalf.

q6.q: What happens if my visa is rejected?
q6.a: We have a legal team specialized in administrative appeals. In France, we operate before the CRRV (Commission for Appeals against Visa Refusal Decisions) in Nantes. Our 3-layer review system significantly reduces the risk of rejection before submission.

about.title: Our French Expertise

hero.title: Leading Your Path to France
hero.description: We combine years of legal experience with a passionate focus on helping global citizens settle in the heart of Europe.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: What began as an international legal advisory firm has evolved into the leading authority on mobility to France.
story.paragraph2: We understand that moving to another country is not just an administrative process—it's a life project. That's why we've perfected our methodology to manage visas and residency with an unmatched success rate.
story.paragraph3: Our constant presence in the Préfectures and our strong relationships with consular authorities allow us to offer a strategic advantage to our clients.

why.title: What Sets Us Apart
why.expertDesc: Exclusively specialized in the French Code for Entry and Residence of Foreigners (CESEDA).
why.adminDesc: Direct and fluid management with Préfectures and the Ministry of the Interior.
why.humanDesc: You are not just a case number. We treat your case with the importance your future deserves.
why.speedDesc: We maximize response times through impeccable document preparation.
why.trustDesc: Total clarity on fees and real success possibilities from the very first consultation.
why.globalDesc: We understand the unique needs of expatriates from all parts of the world.
